Data Engineering

A blog about data, science, and engineering.

    About     Background

    Background

    Education

    I graduated with a Ph.D. from the Computer Science Department of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in December 2011.

    Trivia

    I have an Erdos number of 4.

    Current Research

    My research interests focus primarily on:

    • Data Science and Data Engineering.
    • Data Privacy, Assurance, and Cybersecurity.
    • Trustworthy, Fault-Tolerant, and Reliable Data Infrastructure.
    • Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Intelligent Systems.
    • Stochastic Modeling, Rare Event Simulation, Stochastic Optimization.
    • Dependence and Causality Modeling.
